titleStmt.title: Ordered by the Lord and Commons now assembled in Parliament that one subsidy called tonnage, and one other subsidy called poundage, and those other duties called or known by the name of new impost, shall continue to be paid after the rates, rules and proportions by which they are now due and payable ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: Ordered by the Lord and Commons now assembled in Parliament that one subsidy called tonnage, and one other subsidy called poundage, and those other duties called or known by the name of new impost, shall continue to be paid after the rates, rules and proportions by which they are now due and payable ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
At head of title: Thursday, June 21. 1660.
"Thursday June 21. 1660. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that these orders be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne cleric: Parliamentorum."
Identified on film as Wing E1733 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
